modName: Dragon Souls Lite Patch Solstheim plus Penalties
summary: Dragon Souls (death mod) tweaked! with penalties and solstheim support
descriptionHtml:
This is a modification of Dragon Souls Lite (death mod)
"Bloodgazms's mod Dragon Souls - Death is Highly Overrated"

quick summary:

* When you prey on a altar (any of 9 divines, and in any location (solstheim too))
  your respawn location is assigned to the altar.

* this locations lasts 100 game days, until is destroyed, when this happens, you'll respawn at the troath of the world

* once you death, there is a 50% chance in any equipped item that is lost forever.

* ocne you death, there is a 50% chance for any skill, that were reduced by 1.

* gold is destroyed.

* once you go to your dead location (and activates the lights next to your body bones), you'll recover your items


for example if your character "NORDIC" dies this can be the parameters for "NORDIC" RESPAWNED

NORDIC         NORDIC RESPAWNED
-------------- --------------------------
Archery 20     Archery 19
Block 15        Block 15
On Handed 20 On Handed 19
Illusion 10     Illusion 10
Iron Shield     ---
Iron Sword     Iron Sword
Leather Boots      Leather Boots
Imperial Helm       ---
Hunters Bow         ---
Vampire Armor    Vampire Armor


ALSO this mods is STANDALONE!
    you DONT need
        Dragon Souls - Death is Highly Overrated
        Dragon Souls Lite
author: ELAF
